definition[0]: if a group of people convene, or someone convenes them, they come together, especially for a formal meeting
example[0]: a report by experts convened by the National Institutes of Health
definition[1]: if a group of people convenes, or if someone convenes them, they come together for a formal meeting
example[1]: The conference established five committees which would convene in April or May.
example[2]: It will be necessary to convene a meeting of shareholders.
